{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 802.11g High Power Wireless USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = GSKY_GS-27USB |wikipedia = |brand = GSKY |model = GS-27USB |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = G54 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter |vendor_id = 0bda |device_id = 8187 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:0F:04 |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8187L;RMC, RTL8187L, B5H93A1, LB25B TAIWAN; |chip2 = Realtek;RTL8225;RMC, B7J35S1 LB30F; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691H;626, 691H, 119;1; |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There are likely '''many''' different boards used within these things and chipsets may potentially vary. A good number (.. including this one) may possibly be counterfeit / fake. :The one shown in this entry would seem to be from whatever group made / sold the '''Wifly-City''' stuff The label states the CoO as '''Taiwan'''.. but that may be questionable for some. :The URL on the adapter is http://www.gsky-link.com/. It's long since perma-down, but it's still available [http://web.archive.org/web/20081025025215/http://www.gsky-link.com/en/home/ via archive.org]. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.richwave.com.tw/product_description.php?PNo=69 RTC6691H info page on '''Richwave''''s site] ==Pictures==
